title: Old Video from South Africa Viral as ‘Monkeys in Indian Hospital’
subtitle: Monkeys in Indian Hospital During Coronavirus Outbreak Fact Check: Old Video from South Africa was shared by Pakistani reporter Murtaza Ali Shah as ‘monkeys in hospital of India.’ The video is of 2019 from Durban, South Africa.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video is actually from South Africa and not of COVID wards since it is from 2019.

A search keywords, “monkey” and “hospital” led us to several Twitter users from South Africa, who shared the video in April 2019.
